mapper.select: select s.sche_no, s.sche_title, s.sche_date, trunc(to_date(s.sche_date)-sysdate) "d_day", rank() over (order by trunc(to_date(s.sche_date)-sysdate, 0) asc), s.sche_notice from schedule s, couple c where s.couple_num = c.couple_num and s.couple_num = #{couple_num}
mapper.insert: insert into schedule(couple_num, id, sche_title, sche_date, sche_notice, sche_typecode) select c.couple_num, lm.id, #{sche_title}, #{sche_date}, #{sche_notice}, 'travel' from couple c join ling_member lm on c.mid = lm.id or c.fid = lm.id where lm.id = #{id}
